mapper.select: select * from market_board order by boardnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into market_board (boardnum, memberid, title, contents, category) values (boardnum_seq.nextval, #{memberid}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{category})
insert into market_reply (replynum, boardnum, memberid, replytext) values (replynum_seq.nextval, #{boardnum}, #{memberid}, #{replytext})
